Description: The cmdlet 'Remove-AzureRmSqlDatabaseAuditing' no longer supports the alias 'Remove-AzureRmSqlDatabaseAuditing'.
Remediation: Add the alias 'Remove-AzureRmSqlDatabaseAuditing back to the cmdlet 'Remove-AzureRmSqlDatabaseAuditing'.
